summary: Email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney attempting to obtain access to an expired NBC News interview about a British teen model allegedly lured into Jeffrey Epstein's network. The email discusses contacting NBC for a copy for internal use.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject of the NBC News interview about luring a British teen model into his network.

events.title: NBC News Interview About Epstein Victim
events.description: An NBC News interview titled 'How British teen model was lured into Jeffrey Epstein's web' that has expired and is being sought by a prosecutor.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney is attempting to obtain a copy of an expired NBC News interview about Epstein luring a British teen model.
The email suggests contacting NBC contacts to get a copy for internal use only.
The document shows ongoing investigative interest in media coverage of Epstein's activities as of October 2021.
